channel.title: Need help connecting!
channel.description:
Hello, last night i was playing on a very fun server on moparscape. I had to get off, and now it's the next day later.. I can't get on any servers. Maybe i'm typing something in wrong? I'm still pretty new to this program. Please tell me all the info i need to enter to connect to a server. (exe. Port number if needed, what should it be?)
P.S. Whenever i try to connect, it says "Error connecting to server. Must be down." And so on... Please help me :)

item.title: Need help connecting!
item.dc:creator: @Mathobrat Mathobrat
